import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' import ModalForm from './Components/Modals/Modal' import DataTable from './Components/Tables/DataTable' import { CSVLink } from "react-csv" class App extends Component { state = { items: [] } getItems(){ fetch('http://localhost:3000/crud') .then(response => response.json()) .then(items => this.setState({items})) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } componentDidMount(){ this.getItems() } render() { return (

CRUD Database

 Download CSV ) } } export default App
